failures.title: converts to list saying the name and where each individual is from
failures.fullTitle: index.js attributesToPhrase() converts to list saying the name and where each individual is from

err.message: expected [ Array(5) ] to deeply equal [ Array(5) ]
err.actual:
[
  "$item.name is from $item.hometown"
  "$item.name is from $item.hometown"
  "$item.name is from $item.hometown"
  "$item.name is from $item.hometown"
  "$item.name is from $item.hometown"
]
err.expected:
[
  "Bobby is from Pittsburgh"
  "Sammy is from New York"
  "Sally is from Cleveland"
  "Annette is from Los Angeles"
  "Bobby is from Tampa Bay"
]
err.stack:
AssertionError: expected [ Array(5) ] to deeply equal [ Array(5) ]
    at Context.it (test/indexTest.js:126:46)
